page.title: 12SHOPS CONTINUED
page.content: {1965 They shopped at Shaftesbury and Tisbury, usually Tisbury. There were three shops in Hindon. There used to be a wool shop that sold small things for presents, a baker who delivered and a farmer who delivered milk. {1985 We shop at Shaftesbury mainly, sometimes Tisbury and sometimes at the big shopping centre in Crockerton. We sometimes go into Salisbury for special things such as shoes. We have 4 shops. One is the Post Office which sells mainly food and cleaning stuff. Quite a lot of people go there. Another shop is the delicatessen which sells mainly health foods. The others are antique shops. All the other shops are now houses. There is no baker in the village. The milkman delivers from Tisbury.
